headline: Morgan Stanley Starts Ford (F) Coverage With $14 Target Amid Prolonged EV Slowdown
summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) is included among the 13 Best Blue Chip Stocks to Buy Under $50. headline: Can Labor Unions Recover? Two Experts Square Off
summary: Sharon Block of Harvard Law School is optimistic about unions’ future. as a counterweight to corporations. Veronique de Rugy of George Mason says unions aren’t helping workers.

content.title: Can Labor Unions Recover? Two Experts Square Off
content.summary: Sharon Block of Harvard Law School is optimistic about unions’ future. as a counterweight to corporations. Veronique de Rugy of George Mason says unions aren’t helping workers.

headline: Ford zaps F-150 Lightning EV in pivot to hybrid vehicles
summary: While Ford (F) expects to take up to $19.5 billion in charges over its pivot to hybrid and extended range EVs (EREV) from full electric vehicles, the automaker is also going all in on gas-powered trucks and cancelling the current generation of the F-150 Lightning EVs. Yahoo Finance senior autos reporter Pras Subramanian comes on Market Domination Overtime to further discuss this news. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

content.title: Ford zaps F-150 Lightning EV in pivot to hybrid vehicles
content.description:
While Ford (F) expects to take up to $19.5 billion in charges over its pivot to hybrid and extended range EVs (EREV) from full electric vehicles, the automaker is also going all in on gas-powered trucks and cancelling the current generation of the F-150 Lightning EVs.

Yahoo Finance senior autos reporter Pras Subramanian comes on Market Domination Overtime to further discuss this news.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: Ford takes $19.5B charge in hybrid pivot, cancels F-150 Lightning EV, launches new battery storage business
summary: Ford announced a series of moves in its EV business, pivoting to a hybrid and extended range EV (EREV) strategy instead of full EVs, and will take a whopping $19.5 billion in charges related to the move.

content.title: Ford takes $19.5B charge in hybrid pivot, cancels F-150 Lightning EV, launches new battery storage business
content.summary: Ford announced a series of moves in its EV business, pivoting to a hybrid and extended range EV (EREV) strategy instead of full EVs, and will take a whopping $19.5 billion in charges related to the move.

headline: Ford is starting a battery storage business to power data centers and the grid
summary: Amid Ford’s shift away from making large electric vehicles, the automaker is adding a new product line to find a home for its batteries. Ford said Monday that instead of scuttling plans to build the batteries for those vehicles, it will pivot that capacity into a new battery storage business. Those storage systems, which will use cheaper LFP batteries, will be […]

Those storage systems, which will use cheaper LFP batteries, will be […]

headline: Ford to make big pivot in future vehicle offerings, add a new business
summary: Ford Motor is keeping the F-150 Lightning, but changing its technology. It plans to add thousands of jobs and enter this new business.

content.title: Ford to make big pivot in future vehicle offerings, add a new business

headline: Ford scraps EVs at BlueOval City in TN, has new plan for site
summary: Ford's Tennessee Truck Plant at BlueOval City will be repurposed to manufacture a gas-powered line of "Built Ford Tough" trucks.

content.title: Ford scraps EVs at BlueOval City in TN, has new plan for site
content.summary: Ford's Tennessee Truck Plant at BlueOval City will be repurposed to manufacture a gas-powered line of "Built Ford Tough" trucks.

headline: Ford’s next F-150 Lightning will have a gas generator as it pivots away from large EVs
summary: The company is abandoning plans for a brand new all-electric pickup truck codenamed "T3" and ending production of the battery-only Lightning.

content.title: Ford’s next F-150 Lightning will have a gas generator as it pivots away from large EVs
content.summary: The company is abandoning plans for a brand new all-electric pickup truck codenamed "T3" and ending production of the battery-only Lightning.

headline: Ford Follows Customers to Drive Profitable Growth; Reinvests in Trucks, Hybrids, Affordable EVs, Battery Storage; Takes EV-Related Charges
summary: DEARBORN, Mich., December 15, 2025--Ford Motor Company today announced a series of actions to sharpen its Ford+ plan, executing a decisive redeployment of capital to meet customer demand and drive profitable growth.

content.title: Ford Follows Customers to Drive Profitable Growth; Reinvests in Trucks, Hybrids, Affordable EVs, Battery Storage; Takes EV-Related Charges
content.summary: DEARBORN, Mich., December 15, 2025--Ford Motor Company today announced a series of actions to sharpen its Ford+ plan, executing a decisive redeployment of capital to meet customer demand and drive profitable growth.

headline: Ford to repurpose BlueOval SK Battery Park; 1,500 to lose jobs
summary: Ford will convert its BlueOval SK Battery Park in Glendale into a facility that produces battery energy storage systems. Here's what we know.
